Transfusion.help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.targetHelp: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} siphons the endurance and regeneration rate of {PlayerDest}
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Siphons off your endurance and regeneration rate!
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Siphon_Power.help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing his damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Power.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} weakens {PlayerDest} and improves your damage potential!
Siphon_Power.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} weakening you and empowering them!

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Repel.help: Repel creates a zone of kinetic energy that violently repels nearby foes. Each foe that is repelled costs additional Endurance. Recharge: Slow
Repel.attackerHit: You protect yourself with your {PowerName}, and will knock down any foe that approaches you.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knocked {PlayerDest} from their feet with your {PowerName} attack!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you from your feet with their {PowerName} attack!

Siphon_Speed.help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing his movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long
Siphon_Speed.targetHelp: Your Running Speed potential has been altered. If this is a friendly power, your Running Speed is increased. If you were attacked with this power, though, your Running Speed is reduced.
Siphon_Speed.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has slowed the attack and movement speed of {PlayerDest} while increasing your own!
Siphon_Speed.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with {PowerName} decreasing your attack and movement speed!

messages.attackerHit: You {PowerName} from {PlayerDest} to increase your own!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} slows you with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Increase_Density.help: Increases an ally's mass, freeing him from any Disorient, Immobilization, or Hold effects and leaving him resistant to such effects for a while. Increase Density also protects the target from Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleportation, as well as Smashing and Energy damage. Because the target grows more dense, their movement speed is Slowed. Although the Damage Resistance and slowing effect will not stack with multiple applications, the rest of the effects of Increase Density will. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast
Increase_Density.targetHelp: Your Resistance to Smashing and Energy attacks has been increased. You are more resistant to Hold, Disorient, Immobilize, Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleport attacks, but your movement rates are slightly reduced.
Increase_Density.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Holds, Immobilization, Disorient, Knockback, Repel and enemy Teleportation, as well as smashing and energy damage with your {PowerName} power.
Increase_Density.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protect you from Holds, Immobilization, Disorient, Knockback, Repel, and enemy Teleportation, as well as smashing and energy damage

Speed_Boost.help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Speed_Boost.targetHelp: You've been granted a Speed Boost. Your Attack speed, Endurance recovery and Running speed are all increased and you are resistant to Slow effects.
Speed_Boost.attackerHit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest}, greatly increasing their movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery!
Speed_Boost.victimHit: {PlayerSource} improves your movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery with an extra {PowerName}!

Inertial_Reduction.help: You can reduce your Inertia, along with that of all nearby allies. The affected allies can then jump incredible distances for a while. Recharge: Long
Inertial_Reduction.targetHelp: Your inertia has been reduced, allowing you to make incredible leaps.
Inertial_Reduction.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} allows you to jump incredible distances!
Inertial_Reduction.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your inertia temporarily, allowing you to jump incredible distances!

Transference.help: Transference drains an enemy of some of their Endurance and transfers that Endurance to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transference to recover Endurance for yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Slow

messages.attackerHit: You Siphon the endurance of {PlayerDest} to add to the endurance of everyone near them!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} siphons off your endurance to increase the endurance of all their allies near you!
{PlayerSource} drains some of your endurance with their {PowerName}!
{PlayerSource} drains some of your endurance with their {PowerName}!

Fulcrum_Shift.help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, you, and those near you. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power you and your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a battle. Recharge: Long
Fulcrum_Shift.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduces the damage capability of {PlayerDest}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage capability with their {PowerName}!
